Name: Battery Pack
Description: It's fully charged with precious energy.

Name: Bone Fragment
Description: A small piece of bone.

Name: Cinder Shard
Description: You can feel a warm glow from within this stone.

Name: Clay
Description: Used in crafting and construction.

Name: Coal
Description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.

Name: Copper Bar
Description: A bar of pure copper.

Name: Copper Ore
Description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.

Name: Fiber
Description: Raw material sourced from plants.

Name: Gold Bar
Description: A bar of pure gold.

Name: Gold Ore
Description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

Name: Hardwood
Description: A special kind of wood with superior strength and beauty.

Name: Iridium Bar
Description: A bar of pure iridium.

Name: Iridium Ore
Description: An exotic ore with many curious properties. Can be smelted into bars.

Name: Iron Bar
Description: A bar of pure iron.

Name: Iron Ore
Description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.

Name: Radioactive Bar
Description: Known by the Zuzu City Safety Commission to cause irreversible bodily harm.

Name: Radioactive Ore
Description: It's glowing with dangerous energy... Can be smelted into bars.

Name: Refined Quartz
Description: A more pure form of quartz.

Name: Stone
Description: A common material with many uses in crafting and building.

Name: Quartz
Description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.

Name: Wood
Description: A sturdy, yet flexible plant material with a wide variety of uses.

Name: Bug Meat
Description: It's a juicy wad of bug flesh.

Name: Solar Essence
Description: The glowing face is warm to the touch.

Name: Acorn
Description: This can be planted to grow an oak tree.

Name: Ancient Seed
Description: It's a dry old seed from some ancient plant. By all appearances it's long since dead...

Name: Any Fish
Description: Any fish found in oceans, lakes, rivers, and certain underground locations.

Name: Aquamarine
Description: A shimmery blue-green gem.

Name: Bat Wing
Description: The material is surprisingly delicate.

Name: Blackberry
Description: An early-fall treat.

Name: Chanterelle
Description: A tasty mushroom with a fruity smell and slightly peppery flavor.

Name: Clam
Description: Someone lived here once.

Name: Cloth
Description: A bolt of fine wool cloth.

Name: Coconut
Description: A seed of the coconut palm. It has many culinary uses.

Name: Common Mushroom
Description: Slightly nutty, with a good texture.

Name: Coral
Description: A colony of tiny creatures that clump together to form beautiful structures.

Name: Crocus
Description: A flower that can bloom in the winter.

Name: Crystal Fruit
Description: A delicate fruit that pops up from the snow.

Name: Daffodil
Description: A traditional spring flower that makes a nice gift.

Name: Dandelion
Description: Not the prettiest flower, but the leaves make a good salad.

Name: Diamond
Description: A rare and valuable gem.

Name: Dragon Tooth
Description: These are rumored to be the teeth of ancient serpents. The enamel is made of pure iridium!

Name: Dwarf Gadget
Description: It's a piece of the advanced technology once known to the dwarves. It's still glowing and humming, but you're unable to understand how it works.

Name: Earth Crystal
Description: A resinous substance found near the surface.

Name: Fairy Rose
Description: An old folk legend suggests that the sweet smell of this flower attracts fairies.

Name: Fire Quartz
Description: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava.

Name: Frozen Tear
Description: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti.

Name: Garlic
Description: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be pretty spicy.

Name: Ginger
Description: This sharp, spicy root is said to increase vitality.

Name: Grape
Description: A sweet cluster of fruit.

Name: Hazelnut
Description: That's one big hazelnut!

Name: Honey
Description: It's a sweet syrup produced by bees.

Name: Jazz Seeds
Description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.

Name: Leek
Description: A tasty relative of the onion.

Name: Maple Seed
Description: This can be planted to grow a maple tree.

Name: Maple Syrup
Description: A sweet syrup with a unique flavor.

Name: Marble
Description: A very popular material for sculptures and construction.

Name: Mixed Seeds
Description: There's a little bit of everything here. Plant them and see what grows!

Name: Morel
Description: Sought after for its unique nutty flavor.

Name: Oak Resin
Description: A sticky, fragrant substance derived from oak sap.

Name: Oil
Description: All purpose cooking oil.

Name: Pine Cone
Description: This can be planted to grow a pine tree.

Name: Pine Tar
Description: A pungent substance derived from pine sap.

Name: Poppy Seeds
Description: Plant in summer. Produces a bright red flower in 7 days.

Name: Prismatic Shard
Description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.

Name: Pumpkin
Description: A fall favorite, grown for its crunchy seeds and delicately flavored flesh. As a bonus, the hollow shell can be carved into a festive decoration.

Name: Purple Mushroom
Description: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.

Name: Red Mushroom
Description: A spotted mushroom sometimes found in caves.

Name: Sap
Description: A fluid obtained from trees.

Name: Slime
Description: A shimmering, gelatinous glob with no smell.

Name: Snow Yam
Description: This little yam was hiding beneath the snow.

Name: Spangle Seeds
Description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce a vibrant tropical flower. Assorted colors.

Name: Spice Berry
Description: It fills the air with a pungent aroma.

Name: Sweet Pea
Description: A fragrant summer flower.

Name: Torch
Description: Provides a modest amount of light.

Name: Truffle Oil
Description: A gourmet cooking ingredient.

Name: Tulip Bulb
Description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.

Name: Void Essence
Description: It's quivering with dark energy.

Name: Wild Horseradish
Description: A spicy root found in the spring.

Name: Wild Plum
Description: Tart and juicy with a pungent aroma.

Name: Winter Root
Description: A starchy tuber.
